channel.title: Blog on Martin Lefebvre's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Martin Lefebvre's blog

item.title: My First Blog (post)
item.description: Welcome I welcome you to my first blog post on my first blog. Here you will find random thoughts, tech and development tips I find interesting, and other fun things (for me). How it’s done I’m a geek and a nerd at heart so I’m not going the “easy” way. I’m giving credit to Networkchuck for the idea. Obsidian Posts are in a “Blog” directory in Obsidian (click the link to learn more).
